author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

The fix for double counting in a0c43f3ea4e248d seems to be a bit aggressive. It seems to have reset some MEs that are not per-lumi, so check for that.

This is an alternative to #27237, and probably better. From the comparisons we should be able to tell what is going on.

#### PR validation:
none.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Forward port might be needed, but let's first see if we go with this or #27237.
title: DQM/Tracking: Improve the per-lumi fix
